mapper.select: select vno, tbl_exam_detail.wno wno, word, meaning, img, sentence from (select * from tbl_exam_detail where dno > 0 and mid = #{mid} and eno = #{eno} and result = 'waiting') tbl_exam_detail Left join tbl_word on tbl_exam_detail.wno = tbl_word.wno

select vno, tbl_review_detail.wno wno, word, meaning, img, sentence from (select * from tbl_exam_detail where result = 'x' and mid = #{mid} order by dno) tbl_review_detail Left join tbl_word on tbl_review_detail.wno = tbl_word.wno

select vno, tbl_review_detail.wno wno, word, meaning, img, sentence from (select wno, (@rnum := @rnum + 1) - (select result from tbl_exam where eno = #{examPointer} and type = 'review') as rnum from tbl_exam_detail, ( select @rnum := 0 ) rnum where dno > 0 and result = 'x' and mid = #{mid} having rnum > 0 order by dno) tbl_review_detail Left join tbl_word on tbl_review_detail.wno = tbl_word.wno
